"Turistic Places
Amacayacu Natural Park

By visiting this area you can observe some of the over 500 species of birds, including macaws and parrots . Also they live there close 150 mammals, such as the pink dolphin , manatee , otter , tapir , jaguar and pygmy marmoset . There are also some species of reptiles and many more fascinating species.

The Amacayacu National Park is located in the extreme south department of Amazonas , in the so-called " Amazon rain forest ." The park is the first protected area created in the Colombian Amazon in 1975. It is the only system area parks that protects the lowland rainforest of the Amazon River and floodplain.
Cahuinarí Natural Park

By visiting this area you can see the black caimans up to 10 meters long , and charapas , turtles largest fresh water in the world on the beaches of the Cahuanarí rivers and Bernardo , besides other species such as piranhas, alligators , anacondas , ocelots , tapirs , deer and jaguars. You can practice extreme sports on Lake Taropo as nautical and skiing, boating addition sport fishing.

In the National Park Cahuinarí , measuring 575,000 ha, it is Putumayo the indigenous reserve . The area is inhabited by members of the ethnic Bora , Miraña , Andoque , Nonyuna - Muinane and Huitoto ; trees growing in it and 40 m ..
Tarapoto Lake

It is a special place to watch the pink dolphins, gray and other wild animals in an area surrounded by lush jungle with large trees and hiking trails . Smaller dolphins are gray, and the bigger ones are pink-skinned , these dolphins are unique in the world. We can watch their games and stunts in the Amazonian lake. In this and other lakes in the region can appreciate the " Victoria Regia " ( a huge variety lotus ) . Also you can see the tree or commonly called fertility in the region Capinuri for his particular likeness to the male sexual organ .
The lake is located 80 kilometers from Leticia , about an hour and a half tour of the Amazon , home of the symbols of the Amazon river.
Hotels
Hotels in the city
Utuane Hotel

Utüane is a new project of hotel which aims to offer its customers the maximum rest and comfort after a day full of adventure in the Amazon. Its name inspired by the Ticuna language, means a resting place. Its infrastructure is inspired by nature and in their own malocas the place, rustic but very comfortable. Its décor with a touch of local art identifies each with the name an animal native to the Amazon, with colors that contrast with the beauty of nature. It has 12 bioclimatic malocas were building wood by 95%. The pool and the trails were built with ecological bricks. Seeks to minimize the environmental impact and create environmental awareness among guests. First of all the environment and landscape of the area is respected without altering in the slightest. The hotel is far from noise and conventional tourist area, surrounded by nature. In Utuane promotes ecological, ethnic and responsible adventure tourism, whose priority is respect for nature, environmental and cultural awareness.
Utuane Hotel is located 5 minutes from the city of Leticia on Street 14C No.2A - 11/19, la Sarita
Floating Cabin Kurupira

The Kurupira is a floating hotel , where you can enjoy the charm of the river and beautiful sunsets . The hotel facilities in the Amazon are constructed in local materials , according to the native tradition. Your name Kurupira according to legend is the forest mother, all powerful . If you want to live a real experience in the Amazon this is the place . Dawn in this house is a spectacle Natural : dolphins passing , birds singing , nature in full concert and sun in its splendor. Is Ideal up very early and go to bed early . You can swim in front of the house or having a mud mask in the back . There tourist plans that make ecotourism activities , wildlife observation offered, visits to native communities , lakes and forests.
The hotel is located on the Amazon River 15 minutes outside of Leticia
Decameron Decalodge Ticuna

Among the world´s largest biodiversity. Decalodge Ticuna Hotel is a modern resort all amenities, its location in the heart of Leticia capital of Amazonas Department , makes it a site privileged to be border between Colombia , Peru and Brazil. The structure uses modern design concepts in international hotels. Brazilian samba, Peruvian cuisine, Colombia Decameron passion and spirit converge in this Amazonian charm. Leticia is synonymous with joy , peace and fraternity ; It is considered the place on the planet with the most fascinating showcase unsuspected natural resources thanks to its location on the world´s mightiest river , the Rio Amazonas .
This hotel becomes an unforgettable proposal for lovers of ecotourism , contact with nature and the discovery of new horizons.
It is located at Cra 11 No. 6-11 - Leticia , Amazonas , only 10 minutes from the airport Vasquez Cobo .

Info_demografy
Demographic Information city Leticia

Leticia is a city in the far south of Colombia . It is the capital of the Department Amazon . Despite being away from the main urban centers of the country , without communication road is an important trading link with Brazil due to their situation of border city on the Amazon and close the tripartite milestone with Peru and Brazil River. Currently it meets about 60 % of the department´s population and most diverse indigenous party communities as Huitotos , Ingas , Tucanos , Ticunas and Nukaks . The city has great growth demographic and technically form a single city with the Brazilian town of Tabatinga .

Much of its inhabitants are indigenous , but you can also find many groups , among the most notable are: Huitotos , Yaguas , Tucanos , Ticunas , Camsás , Ingas . Although the city has a population of indigenous descent , the population of Leticia also it has people from the interior of Colombia , which are job opportunities , business, money or tourism.

According to the records of the National Administrative Department Statistics - DANE - for the last five population censuses the Department of Amazonas He went from 12,962 people in 1964 to 67,726 in 2005 , meaning that the population has increased fivefold in 40 years , significant changes between the periods 1975-1984 and 1993-2005 . Similarly you can see the dynamic between the rural population and population Urban , which for censuses of 1985 and 1993 had a greater number of people in the headwaters.
